SpellDef.Description: Target enemy is Weakened if they fail to resist.

GameItemType.Description: These wicked daggers are sharp and bound with dark enchantments. With each strike a target will be weakened if they fail to resist the blades magic.

GameModifier.Provides: Backswing- If the attack misses the unit gets a second attack against the same target
Double Strike- Strike twice at -20 to Accuracy

UnitType.Backstory: The Haecogamela or "Fiend" as it is more commonly known is a vile perversion of man. Fiends are relatively simple creatures, existing only to spill blood. They possess unworldy speed and agility and are quick to engage in combat, tearing at their enemies with a flurry of attacks.
The Scourge is one of the many abyssal creatures that were unheard of prior to the cataclysm...
The Fury is a dangerous flying war machine. This Demon is favoured in times of war, as it's fast movement, quick attacks and flaming attacks are more than enough for most mortals to handle.

The Hellhound is a bestial demon shrouded in flames. They are a favoured creature of Ritualists and Conjurers as they make excellent personal bodyguards thanks to their speed, resilience and deadly charge.

It was Curgen's brother, the Drednir known as Kir-Tion, who first summoned these creatures (known variously as Drednii, or Demons) to Elemental. Upon the very altar where Josryn the Elder received Great Ereog's blessing, Kir-Tion first bound and then sacrificed the Princess Lansa to open a portal to the outer planes... and through that portal came these monsters and their brethren (it should be noted that there are some channelers who believe that the Drednii are simply death magic made flesh, and not separate, sentient creatures). All demons draw their strength from devouring the life-force of other beings.
The horns of these creatures are often used in various alchemical remedies and magical experiments, and are extremely valuable.
